wood_breastplate.description: A flimsily assembled armor made of wood parts and bits of tree bark.
wood_breastplate.flavor: It's time for our enemies to suffer as our foresters do.

clay_breastplate.description: A suit of body armor created with overheated, hard clay plates.
clay_breastplate.flavor: 'You may not pass.' says the Teapot Knight.

stone_breastplate.description: Harder and heavier than it looks. Also not very flexible...
stone_breastplate.flavor: Its defensive capabilities are very solid, though

wood_helm.description: A piece of headgear carved out of a log. Literally.
wood_helm.flavor: Bearded goblins shall inflict certain head strikes.

clay_helm.description: A protective piece of clay armor for the head.
clay_helm.flavor: 'Darling, have you seen my garden pot?'

stone_helm.description: A quite tough piece of head protection.
stone_helm.flavor: Just be careful to not break your neck

wood_shield.description: A large chunk of tree bark used as a shield.

clay_shield.description: An improvised shield made of hard clay.

stone_shield.description: Just keep it between them and you.
stone_shield.flavor: A stone put to good use

wood_spear.description: A crude spear shaved from a hard wood stick.
wood_spear.flavor: The pointy end goes towards the wolves.

stone_spear.description: A spear crafted with a piece of sharpened flint.

stone_axe.description: A small axe assembled with a stone headpiece.
stone_axe.flavor: 'But Workers already carry a metal hatchet' said no Hearthling ever.

clay_sword.description: A ceremonial sword made with hard clay.

sling.description: A very simple yet effective tool for hurling stones.

bag_of_stones.description: Gotta carry some stones for that sling!

bola.description: This weapon has very low damage but a chance of snaring the target in place.

bag_of_bolas.description: Might need a couple of extra ones.

javelin.description: A set of strong spears that can be thrown and will intimidate any foe.

skirmisher.description: This Hearthling currently prefers using shields and throwing or projectile weapons. Click to change!
